from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import requests 
from requests.structures import CaseInsensitiveDict
import json
import pandas as pd

body = f'client_id={client_id}&grant_type=password&resource=https%3A%2F%2Fanalysis.windows.net%2Fpowerbi%2Fapi&{account_password}'
r = requests.post(f'https://login.microsoftonline.com/{tenant_id}/oauth2/token', data=body)
access_token = r.json()['access_token']

headers = CaseInsensitiveDict()
headers["Authorization"] = "Bearer " + access_token

url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups"

resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
safe_print(resp)
obj = resp.json()

groups_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Groups.csv", groups_df.to_csv(index=False), True)
print(groups_df.head())

data_df = pd.DataFrame()
types = ["datasets", "dataflows", "reports"]
for group in groups_df["id"]:
    group = str(group)
    for _type in types:
        url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
        url += group + "/" + _type
        resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
        obj = resp.json()
        new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
        new_df["group_id"] = group
        new_df["type"] = _type[:-1]
        if _type == "dataflows":
            if 'objectId' in new_df.columns:
                new_df["id"] = new_df["objectId"]
        data_df = pd.concat([data_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)

print(data_df.shape)
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Metadata.csv", data_df.to_csv(index=False), True)

report_df = data_df[data_df["type"] == "report"]
pages_df = pd.DataFrame()
for id_ in report_df["id"]:
    group = report_df[report_df["id"] == id_]["group_id"].iloc[0]
    url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
    url += group + "/reports/" + id_ + "/pages"
    resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    obj = resp.json()
    new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
    new_df["report_id"] = id_
    new_df["group_id"] = group
    pages_df = pd.concat([pages_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/ReportPages.csv", pages_df.to_csv(index=False), True)
print(pages_df.shape)

# Datasources

API only allows getDatasource calls on datasets, dataflows and RDL(paginated reports). Standard reports don't support getDatasource calls.

datasources_df = pd.DataFrame()
resources = ["datasets", "dataflows", "reports"]
for id_ in data_df["id"]:
    group = data_df[data_df["id"] == id_]["group_id"].iloc[0]
    resource = data_df[data_df["id"] == id_]["type"].iloc[0] + "s"
    url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
    url += group + "/" + resource + "/" + id_ + "/" + "datasources"
    resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    obj = resp.json()
    new_df = pd.DataFrame()
    if "value" in obj.keys():
        if len(obj["value"]) > 0:
            new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
            new_df["resource_id"] = id_
            new_df["group_id"] = group
            new_df["resource_type"] = resource[:-1]
            new_df["id"] = new_df["datasourceId"]
    datasources_df = pd.concat([datasources_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Datasources.csv", datasources_df.to_csv(index=False), True)
print(datasources_df.shape)

refresh_df = pd.DataFrame()
datasets_dataflows = data_df[(data_df['type'] == 'dataset') | (data_df['type'] == 'dataflow')]
for id_ in datasets_dataflows["id"]:
    group = datasets_dataflows[datasets_dataflows["id"] == id_]["group_id"].iloc[0]
    type_ = datasets_dataflows[datasets_dataflows["id"] == id_]["type"].iloc[0] + "s"
    url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
    url += group + "/" + type_ + "/" + id_ + "/"
    if type_ == "datasets":
        url += "refreshes"
    else:
        url += "transactions"
    resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    obj = resp.json()
    new_df = pd.DataFrame()
    new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
    new_df["resource_id"] = id_
    new_df["group_id"] = group
    new_df["resource_type"] = type_[:-1]
    refresh_df = pd.concat([refresh_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/RefreshHistory.csv", refresh_df.to_csv(index=False), True)
print(refresh_df.shape)

# Imports

Adding import name to data dataframe to files created when importing .pbix files

imports_df = pd.DataFrame()
for group in groups_df["id"]:
    group = str(group)
    url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
    url += group + "/" + "imports"
    resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    obj = resp.json()
    if "value" in obj.keys():
        new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
        new_df["group_id"] = group
        imports_df = pd.concat([imports_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)

data_df["import_name"] = ""

#mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Imports.csv", imports_df.to_csv(index=False), True)

for id_ in imports_df["id"]:
    name = imports_df[imports_df["id"] == id_]["name"].iloc[0]
    datasets = imports_df[imports_df["id"] == id_]["datasets"].iloc[0]
    reports = imports_df[imports_df["id"] == id_]["reports"].iloc[0]
    dataflows = imports_df[imports_df["id"] == id_]["dataflows"].iloc[0]
    for dataset in datasets:
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == dataset["id"], "import_name"] = name
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == dataset["id"], "isFromPbix"] = "TRUE"
    for report in reports:
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == report["id"], "import_name"] = name
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == report["id"], "isFromPbix"] = "TRUE"
    for dataflow in dataflows:
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == dataflow["id"], "import_name"] = name
        data_df.loc[data_df["id"] == dataflow["id"], "isFromPbix"] = "TRUE"
#print(data_df[data_df["import_name"] != ""])
data_df.loc[data_df["isFromPbix"] != "TRUE", "isFromPbix"] = "FALSE"
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Metadata.csv", data_df.to_csv(index=False), True)

users_df = pd.DataFrame()
for group in groups_df["id"]:
    group = str(group)
    url = "https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/groups/"
    url += group + "/users"
    resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    obj = resp.json()
    new_df = pd.DataFrame.from_records(obj["value"])
    users_df = pd.concat([users_df,new_df],ignore_index=True)

print(users_df.shape)
users_df.drop_duplicates(subset="identifier", inplace=True)
users_df.reset_index(inplace=True, drop=True)
print(users_df)
mssparkutils.fs.put("/PBIMetadata/Users.csv", users_df.to_csv(index=False), True)
